items.text: Octopuses are like underwater superheroes with eight arms that can twist and turn in amazing ways!
Imagine being able to slip through the tiniest cracks—octopuses can do just that by changing their shape!
When they swim, octopuses look like they’re dancing, trailing their arms behind them in a graceful wave!
